post.body: He did more than write back! He jst called from venezuela! & left his nmbrs. Yah its 6amish. This is sooooo surreal man its a trip!
Yeah made it bak to practice finally!!!
I luv Chuey
far too much death this year...:-(
Brain freeze...
Ahh finllly get to sit for a min :)
Just rmmbrd, got aonther memorial service tonite! :-(
stalling leaving for work!
Headed home frm airport in cab...memorial service was sweet & lovely.
Picking up rental car & headed to fremont...yikes!
Made it to san jose
Feelin groovy :-)
Apples n peanut butter...mmm yummy!
Pageflakes? Wuts wrong w/it!
Yikes huge tumbleweed mid hiway!!!
Party on Garth
Deprture goal noon. Made on the dot!...but i'll b at this dang stop lite forevr!
done w/wrk early, so drivin across twn on adventure to find the amazing vegan spring rolls
Wow no mulah today! Only 5 peeps!
serenity now!!!!!!
